properties.name: fhir.server.profile.bootstrap
properties.description: If true, server will upload MHD relevant resources (StructureDefinition) to the FHIR server to allow validation.

properties.name: fhir.server.base
properties.description: Endpoint of the FHIR R4 Server that will be used as backend

properties.name: ipf.atna.mock.recent
properties.description: Limit the number ATNA message to the most recent 'n'.

properties.name: ipf.atna.mock.enabled
properties.description: Enable ATNA mock actuator endpoint (exposed on /actuator/atna)	Disable Mock to send ATNA event to a 'real' ATNA server.

properties.name: xds.endpoint.iti8
properties.description: ITI-8 endpoint host and port binding
